name: HTMLMediaElement.load
description: The HTMLMediaElement method load() resets the media element to its initial state and begins the process of selecting a media source and loading the media in preparation for playback to begin at the beginning.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement.load()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLMediaElement.load()' in the 'HTML5' specification.
